Function GetA_ofPAn parameters P,i,n,A,lPost
lPost:=iif(lPost==NIL,.t.,lPost) if (lPost) A:= P * (i/100) / (1 - (1+i/100)^(-n)) else A:= P * (i/100) / (1 - (1+i/100)^(-n)) / (1+i/100) endif
Return A endfunc
